TITLE: Sketches for the prelude and act one of Tristan und Isolde
CURRENT LOCATION:
The New York Public Library, Music Division,
Shelf locator: JOB 73-92 (Locked case)
DESCRIPTION: Piano scoring (sketch?) for first 19 bars of the ristan und Isolde prelude to act one, followed by various themes from that act.
CONTENT: Holograph sketches in pencil and ink in the New York Public Library.
RIGHTS HOLDER: Formerly owned by Josephine Jacobs. Now held by The New York Public Library under public domain.
